title: Web fonts survey, fontlist, fontinfo
content:
Dear Typophiles,

I’m making a survey to determine which fonts are commonly installed on different operating systems.

Please take a survey at:  
 [Web fonts survey](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025052548/http:/taat.pl/webfonts/)  
(it’s just one click)

Please spread it.  
Thank you for your help.

As a reward:  
1. If you want to see/print all your installed fonts,  
use this JavaScript/CSS tool:  
 [FontList](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025052548/http:/taat.pl/fontlist)

2. CSS typographic attributes bookmarklet:  
 [fontInfo bookmarklet](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025052548/http:/taat.pl/firefox/#fontinfo)

regards,  
Tom

ps. We do not store any private information, file/license information.
